Item.Description: +20 Ability Power

Item.Name: Archangel's Staff
Item.Description: +250 Mana|+50 Ability Power|+10 Mana Regen per 5 seconds||Unique Passive - Insight: Gain Ability Power equal to 3% of your Maximum Mana.||Unique Passive - Mana Charge: Each time you cast a spell or spend Mana, you gain 6 maximum Mana (3 second cooldown). Bonus caps at +750 Mana. This item transforms once it reaches +750 Mana, gaining a powerful mana shield active.

Item.Name: Athene's Unholy Grail

You gain all the gold this unit earns - 180 second cooldown.

Item.Name: Banshee's Veil
Item.Description: +400 Health|+375 Mana|+50 Magic Resist||Unique Passive: Gain a spell shield that blocks the next incoming enemy ability (45 second cooldown).

Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Alacrity bonus.||Unique Passive - Alacrity: +15 Movement Speed

Item.Name: Berserker's Greaves - Enchantment: Captain
Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Captain bonus.||Unique Passive - Captain: Allied champions running towards you gain a 8% movement speed boost. Nearby minions gain 25% additional movement speed.

Item.Name: Berserker's Greaves - Enchantment: Distortion
Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Distortion bonus.||Unique Passive - Distortion: Your Teleport, Flash and Ghost summoner spell cooldowns are reduced by 25%.

Item.Name: Berserker's Greaves - Enchantment: Furor
Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Furor bonus.||Unique Passive - Furor: Whenever you deal damage with a single target attack or spell, you gain 12% bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds.

Item.Name: Berserker's Greaves - Enchantment: Homeguard
Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Homeguard bonus.||Unique Passive - Homeguard: When you are at fountain and have been out of combat for 8 seconds you gain full health, mana and a 200% movement speed boost that decays over 8 seconds. You lose the movement speed when you enter combat.

Item.Name: Bilgewater Cutlass
Item.Description: +25 Attack Damage|+12% Lifesteal||Unique Active: Deals 100 magic damage and slows the target champion's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds - 90 second cooldown. 500 range.

Item.Name: Blackfire Torch
Item.Description: +80 Ability Power|+250 Health|+10 mana regeneration per 5 seconds||Unique Passive: +20% Cooldown Reduction||Unique Passive: +20 Magic Penetration||Unique Passive: Your spells burn for an additional 5% of the target champion's maximum Health in magic damage over 3 seconds. Each second burned consumes a charge. One charge is generated each second.

Item.Name: Blade of the Ruined King
Item.Description: +25 Attack Damage|+15% Lifesteal|+40% Attack Speed||Unique Passive: Your attacks deal 5% of the target's current health in magic damage and heals you for half the amount (60 max vs. minions).|| Unique: Drains target champion, dealing 15% of the champion's maximum Health in physical damage and healing you by the same amount. Additionally you steal 30% of their movement speed for 4 seconds - 60 second cooldown. (500 range)

Additionally, Rengar's next ability used after activating Thrill of the Hunt generates 1 bonus Ferocity."

Item.Name: Runaan's Hurricane
Item.Description: +70% Attack Speed||Unique Passive: Your basic attacks fire minor bolts at 2 nearby targets, each dealing 10 + 50% of your Attack Damage. These apply on-hit effects.

Item.Name: Runic Bulwark
Item.Description: +400 Health|+20 Armor|+30 Magic Resist||Unique Aura - Legion: Nearby allies gain 10 Armor, 30 Magic Resist and 10 Health Regen per 5. (Unique Auras with the same name don't stack.)

Item.Description: +500 Health|+80 Ability Power||Unique Passive: Dealing spell damage slows the target's Movement Speed by 35% for 1.5 seconds (15% for multi-target and damage-over-time spells).

Transforms from Archangel's Staff at 750 Mana.

Item.Name: Shard of True ice
Item.Description: +45 Ability Power||Unique Aura: Mana Warp - Nearby allied champions gain 6 mana regen per 5 seconds.||Unique Passive: Lucky Shadow - Gain an additional 4 gold every 10 seconds.||Unique Active: Surrounds an ally with a blizzard for 4 seconds that slows nearby enemy movement speed by 30%. 60 second cooldown.

Item.Name: Sheen
Item.Description: +250 Mana|+25 Ability Power||Unique Passive: After using an ability, your next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to your base Attack Damage (2 second cooldown).

Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Distortion bonus.||Unique Passive - Distortion: Your Teleport, Flash and Ghost summoner spell cooldowns are reduced by 25%.

Item.Name: Sorcerer's Shoes - Enchantment: Homeguard
Item.Description: Enchants these boots to have the Homeguard bonus.||Unique Passive - Homeguard: When you are at fountain and have been out of combat for 8 seconds you gain full health, mana and a 200% movement speed boost that decays over 8 seconds. You lose the movement speed when you enter combat.

Item.Name: Sword of the Occult
Item.Description: +10 Attack Damage||Unique Passive: Your champion gains 5 Attack Damage per stack, receiving 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist (stacks up to 20). You lose a third of your stacks on death. At 20 stacks, your champion's Movement Speed is increased by 15%.

Item.Name: Tear of the Goddess
Item.Description: +250 Mana|+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds||Unique Passive - Mana Charge: Each time you cast a spell or spend Mana, your maximum Mana increases by 4 (3 second cooldown). Bonus caps at +750 Mana. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Item.Name: The Bloodthirster
Item.Description: +60 Attack Damage|+12% Lifesteal||Passive: Gain bonus +1 Attack Damage and +0.20% Lifesteal per kill. Bonuses cap at +40 Attack Damage and +8% Lifesteal. Half of bonuses are lost upon death.

Item.Name: The Brutalizer
Item.Description: +25 Attack Damage||Unique Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction||Unique Passive: +10 Armor Penetration (Armor Penetration allows you to deal more physical damage to high Armored targets. % Armor Penetration is applied before Flat Armor Penetration when calculating damage.)
